mean_cn: adj. 东方的；  n. 东方人
mean_en: connected with or typical of the eastern part of the world, especially China and Japan, and the people who live there
sentence: Oriental countries each have ancient traditions and their own unique culture.
sentence_trans: 东方各国都有古老的传统和自己独特的文化。
word_etyma: orient东方的 + al形容词后缀 → oriental东方人；东方的；亚洲的
